Articles.Content:
Hey there.

I was wondering if by any chance there was a mod that would allow to play sandbox mode, but where you would have to budget your missions? Maybe have some rewards after completing a given mission, stuff like that.

Basically, the career mode, but without the science.

I think I recall there was mods like this way back when, back in the time when science was not yet here, but I don't think I've seen anything like that in recent time.

Thanks
Why not play career mode but without science? Either debug menu in a bunch of science, or use my modlet called TreeToppler (check my modlet page in my signature) to unlock the whole tree.

I did not think about that!

Plain and simple solution, thanks!
